Simbine married Samora Machel, the first president of Mozambique, in 1975.
Samora Machel died in office in 1986 when his presidential aircraft crashed near the Mozambique-South Africa border.
Graça Machel Mandela married her second husband, Nelson Mandela, in Johannesburg on 18 July 1998, Mandela's 80th birthday.
